Summary Heading: Friendly staff makes your stay comfortable
Summary: Friendly staff. Great and quiet area ,. Comfortable rooms . Great TV selections and great wifi connections. Right across the street is a great breakfast establishment that has great full breakfast.  I've made this motel my place to stay when I'm in orange county.
Manager Response: Hi Pioneer11830930760 ,  Thank you for your compliments to our staff, hospitality and breakfast layout. We appreciate your compliments and we take high pride in the peaceful ambiance that we can provide to our guests. We hope to see you stay with us more in the future as we promise to push our services better to provide you the most pleasant stay that you can find. We thank you that you highlighted our strengths in your review. May you return again soon and feel at home just like the last time!

Summary: Was the best trip ive taken in many years. Just by chance an ex love lived right across the street, in which i was reconnected with for a brief time after 28 years. Was great just spending the day and part of the night with her after all those years
Manager Response: rd2865,  Thank you for your high rating of our hotel and for taking the time to share your experience!  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you found the accommodations and service to be satisfactory. We greatly appreciate the time you've taken to rate our hotel and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The regancy motel is one of the best motels in brea i really like the owners there very nice for what ever reason u need something just call the front desk and they will help u ou...They also have very nice rooms i seriously recommend Regancy motel ...
Manager Response: Hi X1730YVjaimea,  Greetings from Regency Motel. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and to acknowledge the efforts of our hardworking staff to be as accommodating, helpful, and welcoming as possible.  Our ultimate ambition is to provide a five-star experience, and we are thrilled to learn that we have succeeded. Our management is always happy to serve you and we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: My visit was during COVID, so it was relatively quiet. Decor and amenities were nice. Sufficient for a one night stay, but my bed was uncomfortable and the pillows were nearly flat. If it had been busier, I probably would have had major complaints about noise as the walls are pretty thin. I’d stay again in a pinch, but not for more than one night.   Staff was courteous and efficient. Check in was easy.
Manager Response: Jen3700,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this thorough and insightful review. We appreciate that you've taken the time to share the ways that we have impressed you and the ways that we can improve.  I do apologize for the discomfort you experienced with our bed.  Your feedback will help us to recognize our strengths and improve upon our weaknesses. On behalf of our entire staff, we thank you for choosing our hotel and hope you will let us serve you again.

Summary: Booked jacuzzi room to have a relaxing evening. The property was very quiet and well kept. Room was extremely clean, well decorated and the staff was very nice and helpful. Will definitely stay here again. A+
Manager Response: Pursuitofhappinessoc,  Thank you for your kind comments and 5 star rating.  It is very rewarding to hear your perspective of our hotel and we appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a clean, comfortable, and hospitable experience. We greatly appreciate the time you've taken to rate our hotel and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great hotel!!  Great staff!!! Will definetly come back!!!! Super clean rooms!!  Spacious and sleek!! Close to downtown brea and also conviently close to many restaurants as well. A little gem in a friendly beautiful little gem of a town in brea
Manager Response: poppacdub,  Greetings from Regency Motel. Your kind compliments mean so much to us, and we thank you for taking the time to share this review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, our high standards of housekeeping and our friendly and welcoming staff. We hope that your next visit will be another five star experience.

Summary: Pretty nice, extra sheets and pads came in handy from home, check in was a breeze, house keeping and guest service/front desk provide a warm welcoming service and atmosphere. Complementary breakfast is on point.
Manager Response: Saggingdiaper,  Thank you for your compliments to our staff, hospitality and breakfast layout. We are all pleased to learn we were able to make you feel comfortable  and that our services and accommodations lived up to your expectations.  We will happily share your comments with our staff and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: beautiful rooms, great and freindy staff ,vic at the front office is really cool. good prices, very clean and very peaceful and quiet area. very enjoyable place to stay. with a laundry area on site. which a lot of placesndo not have.
Manager Response: timdH4288KD,  Thank you so much for your feedback and kind words regarding the five star service and accommodations that you received during your most recent stay with us!  It is very rewarding to hear your perspective of our hotel and we appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a clean, comfortable, and hospitable experience. We are all looking forward to your next visit and hope it will be just as enjoyable.

Summary: Beautiful rooms the price was definitely motel price but I felt like I was in a hotel. The staff was very friendly and made me feel at home instead of a visitor. Ended up staying an extra night cause the price is unheard of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. Your feedback is much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: For a cheaper hotel it was clean and a good place to sleep. Nothing fancy but a nice place to stay. Great office staff. We got there late after leaving our first hotel that was disgusting and our reservation had not shown up yet but they got us in a room and said we would figure it out in the morning. Very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this five star experience with our management, staff, and future guests. I'm glad that our services, hospitality, and accommodations exceeded your expectations and hope that you experience the same comfortable stay during your next visit! We look forward to serving you again!

Summary Heading: Best location motel in Brea/Orange County
Summary: I stayed one week - and - I'm a repeat guest - this is my 5th visit in 7 years.  Great, comfortable, remodeled rooms and a terrific location on So. Brea Blvd - across from Kimmies Cafe (superb breakfast / lunch venue); not far from the Imperial Hwy and Brea Center: everything you need is near - lots of eateries, coffee shops, restaurants, shopping and entertainment.  Price is high but it is Orange County after all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. Your feedback is much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Many issues with this hotel & our room. Don’t waste your money. Never got room service, the room was dirty, the towels dirty with holes, furniture was ripped & scratched. Questionable pen found. Police were around a lot and that mad us worry more.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Regency Motel we apologize for not meeting expectations. We are working hard to improve our service and would like to re earn your business on your next visit to Brea. Our rooms have been renovated to a new standard and believe will meet expectations.

Summary: the room is large and it's clean....within walking distance are some decent places to grab something to eat...close to Disneyland and Knott's berry farm..easy access to the freeways as well...it's an affordable place to stay...i would agree that it's a no frills type of place tho....
Manager Response: On behalf of the Regency Motel I sincerely apologize for your experience with us. We pride ourselves in making your stay exceptional and we hope you can come back to stay with us to redeem your confidence in us.

Summary: Can't beat the Regency for affordability and reliable cleanliness. Of any of the no-frills Motels in these parts of OC, the Regency has the most channel-packed HD TV service. Will return, perhaps exclusively, when I need cheap digs in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. Your feedback is much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Frankly, it was a dump.  I was ashamed to have told my relatives to go there (before I knew any better).  There were not adequate towels or hangers, everything needed was "upon request."  When I called on the phone I couldn't get anyone for several tries, then it seemed as if I'd awoken the clerk and she was of no help.  I tried to cancel my reservation and was denied, even though I had complaints.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Regency Motel I sincerely apologize for your experience with us. We pride ourselves in making your stay exceptional and we hope you can come back to stay with us to redeem your confidence in us.

Summary: It was pretty bad. The manager wasn't too nice, had an attitude. The room looked nice once I got in, looked to be remodeled recently. I liked the fake wood floors! No carpet which was great. I had the worst gut feeling there the second I got there. Travelling solo as a woman, I felt absolutely so unsafe! I woke up with many bed bug bites all over my body. Absolutely do not stay here! Avoid avoid avoid!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Regency Motel I sincerely apologize for your experience with us. We pride ourselves in making your stay exceptional and we hope you can come back to stay with us to redeem your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Nice manager, but the rooms lacked cleanliness.
Summary: The manager was nice and polite, but the rooms were run down and dirty. The room was bigger than the other rooms we have stayed at. The floor of our room made the bottom of our feet all black. The motel looked unsafe.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Regency Motel I sincerely apologize for your experience with us. We pride ourselves in making your stay exceptional and we hope you can come back to stay with us to redeem your confidence in us.

Summary: It is so refreshing to find such a great place to stay at in knowing you will be well taken care of in every possible way.  Not only are the newly remodeled rooms clean but everything works great in the room as well. As Richard K. stated in his review, the prices are very affordable. You truly get more than what you paid for.  Everyone from the owners to the cleaning staff are extremely accommodating. They all have a very pleasant demeanor no matter what the need is or what time of day it is.  The area is very safe & is very close to churches, shopping & restaurants.  We highly recommend this to be the only place to stay in Brea.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. Your feedback is much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Richard & Karen:  My husband and I have enjoyed staying at the Regency Motel.  I am not sure when dave and marie w stayed at the Regency, but my husband and I have made the Regency motel our home.  The owners are pleasant, wonderful people.  I sleep like a baby the linen is fresh and clean and the towels as well.  We have a nice refrigerator and microwave.  The accommodations are what is needed at affordable prices.  When we travel again, we will stay at the Regency Hotel, in Brea.  This is the place to be for a good night's rest.
Manager Response: Richard K,  Thank you so much for your kind words regarding the cleanliness and fresh smell of your lodgings.  Our ultimate ambition is to provide a five star experience, and we are thrilled to learn that we have succeeded. We're glad you had a great time with us and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in brea
Summary: My wife and i have stayed several times at Brea Regency and have always been impressed by how clean and quiet it is there. they owners are in my opinion are some of the best people we have ever encountered,They are very professional, courtious and very friendly and always try to accomodate people with a very friendly attitude. They have remodeled the rooms with very tastful decor and new bathrooms with marble showers even the sink area  has marble counter tops and rooms have been painted with very nice complementing colors. The owners try their best to keep the riff raff out of the motel and the prices are really affordable. The cleaning staff have the highest reguards to cleaning the rooms and keeping the suppies up, always clean towels! we have always felt safe and secure to
Manager Response: andrew p,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our guest satisfaction survey and for rating our hotel so highly!  It means a lot to us that you’ve taken the time to share the many positive features of your most recent stay with us. Your feedback will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to provide an exceptional and memorable experience for every guest. We look forward to serving you again!

Summary: Our family came here to relax and get away.  From about 10 pm to midnight the room next door was swarming with police.  Apparently several people in the room were on probation for drugs.  They had drug dogs, women and men sitting outside our room in cuffs, being interviewed.  Not the most wholesome atmosphere for our family!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about the inconveniences that you encountered during your recent stay at our hotel.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.
